name: ListSurveySubmissions
description:
Retrieve all survey submissions for a specific type.

Use this tool to obtain a list of all survey submissions associated with a particular survey type. Useful for analyzing survey results or monitoring participation.

parameters.name: survey_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of survey for which to list submissions. This must be provided as a JSON object including necessary parameters specific to the survey type.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
